Liono takes off towards the get to the base Liono aims shuko missile and Fire 
a shoot destroying the missile the blast knocks Liono back into the shields 
"Iris this is  
Liono Convoy reconfigure autoguns on vector 2.9 save old stats and up to this 
factor if its not maximal Alliance or Pred its toast." 

The auto stop for a moment and start attack the newcomers only.

Tigerhawk looks to Liono "I forgot to give you this the Terra Star is 
Finished" Places the little Bracelet in Liono hands. "It should work with 
your protoform well you metalboism you acquired from the bat in your beast 
mode will allow you digest what you take in" 

Liono Attaches the Gold and silver braclet with to sharp points sticking out 
to his wrist and feel a sharp pain as it Runs new wires through is 
system."Tigerhawk go man the base guns and thanks again." Liono looks to 
Zardus and hellbeast "I know we never agreed on anything but we cannot let 
The Oblitercons join to together and make Dark Messiah. ALL MAXIMALS YOUR 
MAIN GOAL IS TO DEFEAT THE OBLITERCONS FIRST."  Liono aims the bracelet at 
Sixshots back side fires the two points spiral off towards sixshots backside.
